items.title: What investors piling into gold and silver can learn from King Henry VIII
items.description: A Deutsche Bank analyst argues those betting on the “debasement trade” may be operating from a faulty premise.

items.title: This energy ETF is set to break through a key level, charts show. Two ways to play the trend
items.description: The State Street Energy Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLE) is poised to break through a resistance level of $50, the charts suggest.

items.title: Your income-generating investments could create a tax bill. How to prepare for the season
items.description: The tax-filing season officially kicked off on Monday. Investors should watch their mailboxes for key documents they'll need to complete their returns...

items.title: Forget the 60/40 portfolio. This investor is 70/30 stocks and cash
items.description: Ken Mahoney, CEO of Mahoney Asset Management, said investors should hold onto a "meaningful amount" of cash this year.

items.title: RBC sees a bunch of red flags on Palantir ahead of earnings, sees stock eventually falling 70%
items.description: RBC said that shares of Palantir are still trading at an "unfavorable" risk-reward ratio, despite shedding 9% over the past three months.
